metadata.title: CVE-2020-13577 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the WS-Security plugin functionality of Genivia gSOAP 2.8.107. A specially crafted SOAP request can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gsoap package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
